DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the hypothesis that advanced hemodynamic monitoring results in an earlier detection of circulatory failure in newborn infants
DOC.criteria: Birth weight >700 grams Arterial catheter in place Central venous catheter in place Informed consent from parents/legal representatives Lifethreatening congenital defects Congenital heart defects, except patent ductus arteriosus and patent foramen ovale
